Articles.Content:
For about a year now I've been looking a mod to give space ship/fighters "combat AI" to move ships around, turn guns to face and to dodge incoming fire.

Are there any fighter/ship AIs out yet for use with BDA these days?

You should check out Tapegaming or/and BeardyPenguin on youtube, they are doing moddified BDA space battle stuff.

Hope this helps.

On March 9, 2018 at 1:18 PM, Vanamonde said:

This discussion of add-ons has been moved to Add-on Discussions. 

Bah humbug to you too sir

I've created a BDA add-on that puts a bunch of articulating laser turrets into the game.  You can fly ships around using the AI and have them shoot at each other.  It only works in space under specific circumstances, but I've successfully used Kopernicus to create atmospheres around some moons that would make it appear like a space battle.  I'll have more videos coming soon.

 - Jett
